start.speaker: toby
start.display: Hey there, listeners, this is Tobias "The Brain" Weaver coming at you LIVE from Atlas, Arizona, here to fill YOUR evening with the best tunes a scientist at the bottom of the ocean could ever hope for!

B.text: Wow! A private broadcast with my FAVORITE DJ!

favDJ.speaker: ingram
favDJ.display: Wow! A private broadcast with my FAVORITE DJ!

favDJ.1.speaker: toby
favDJ.1.display: Hey there, caller! What's your name? Nah, I'm just kidding. This signal only has two ends.

heyToby.1.speaker: toby
heyToby.1.display: I can feel your excitement. I'm the best underwater DJ there is, and you know it.

B.text: I guess if you're the *only* underwater DJ...

onlyDJ.speaker: ingram
onlyDJ.display: I guess if you're the *only* underwater DJ...

notUnder.1.speaker: toby
notUnder.1.display: But I *am* the only radio broadcaster to be broadcasting to the bottom of the ocean. That makes me an underwater DJ. Let me live my dream.

sec3.speaker: toby
sec3.display: Anyway, as you can probably tell, I'm kind of excited that we get to use the radios. I always knew my passion for HAM would pay off eventually.

A.text: It's too bad about the wifi, though.

B.text: Yeah, it is kind of fun.

noWifi.speaker: ingram
noWifi.display: It's too bad about the wifi, though. I'm just relieved that it's holding up enough to send the data through. Being able to see other people's faces definitely makes being down here more bearable, though.

radioFun.speaker: ingram
radioFun.display: Yeah, it is kind of fun. I'm grateful that they're here at all. I'd probably go crazy without anyone to talk to down here.

sec4.speaker: toby
sec4.display: Yeah... I still wish I could be there.

B.text: I wish you could be here, too.

dontWorry.speaker: ingram
dontWorry.display: Don't worry about it. I'll get your data for you.

wishYou.speaker: ingram
wishYou.display: I wish you could be here, too.

wishYou.re.speaker: toby
wishYou.re.display: But wishful thinking gets us nowhere. *You're* down there, so you better get me all of that juicy ocean gossip!

cont.speaker: toby
cont.display: I'm kind of miffed that it took the rest of the drones so long to arrive - like, what would they have done if I *was* down there? Would I have just sat around doing *nothing* all day?

cont1.speaker: ingram
cont1.display: I feel you, buddy. But they're here now.

cont2.speaker: toby
cont2.display: Yeah, yeah. And Geneva will have our heads if we don't deliver the results.

agreed.speaker: ingram
agreed.display: Agreed. So let's get this party started.

beFine.speaker: ingram
beFine.display: I'm sure we'll be fine. We've got these brand new drones, and still like two weeks to collect enough samples.

beFine.re.speaker: toby
beFine.re.display: I hope it's enough time... Moving on...

cont3.speaker: toby
cont3.display: Do they look okay, though? If those stupid beaurecrats skimped on padding because it was *"too expensive"* I'm gonna be pissed.

cont4.speaker: ingram
cont4.display: They look fine as far as I can tell.

cont5.speaker: toby
cont5.display: They had better. The last time I was down there I cleared a space by my bunk to set up the charging stations. Do you see it? It's the big shelf.

cont6.speaker: ingram
cont6.display: Um... hang on. I can't move the radio. I'll be right back, I'm gonna go take a look.

cont12.speaker: ingram
cont12.display: What happened to not counting your chickens before they've hatched? We only got okayed to get more drones a few months ago!

cont13.speaker: toby
cont13.display: I wanted to be ready! All ten of my little babies asleep by their mother... This is the closest to parenthood I'm ever going to get! Anyway, just get their chargers set up properly.

cont16.speaker: ingram
cont16.display: Which box are the replacement chargers in?

cont17.speaker: toby
cont17.display: Why would I know? They sent them straight from the manufacturer. (muttering)...stupid metalheads... I can't believe they sent the wrong chargers last time. It's their own product! We couldn't even use the drones that *were* there. Pathetic.

cont19.speaker: toby
cont19.display: Hold it up to the camera.

cont21.speaker: ingram
cont21.display: ...No, this one is empty, too. Hey, Toby?

cont28.speaker: blank
cont28.display: (There are sounds of static and muffled cursing, and then what sounds like a surprised yell.)

cont30.speaker: toby
cont30.display: I'm... Eugh... I was chewing on a pen and it burst in my mouth... Blech... Just... set up the charging stations that are there and I'll be back in a few minutes to give you the rundown of how to operate the drones.

cont31.speaker: toby
cont31.display: I need to go rinse out my mouth...

start.speaker: toby
start.display: yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay you made it to a part you can only get to if the requirements are fulfilled

sec3.speaker: blank
sec3.display: what did you say about me you little bitch ill have you know i graduated

start.speaker: toby
start.display: if you chose 2A you shouldn't be here.

sec3.speaker: blank
sec3.display: what did you say about me you little bitch ill have you know i graduated
